item.title: Tricky to me, simple to some of you. SOLVED
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

i added the things u deleted again ;D

                                            case 3024:
                            if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000) //{
                            return;
                            c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
                            c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
                            c.setAnimation(0x33D);
                           
                            c.sM("You drink some of the recovery special.");
                            c.sM("You have 3 doses of the potion left.");

c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
//}
if (c.specialAmount > 90) {
c.sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
} // THIS
break;
case 3026:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000) //{
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.setAnimation(0x33D);

                            c.sM("You drink some of the recovery special.");
                            c.sM("You have 2 doses of the potion left.");

c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
//}
if (c.specialAmount > 90) {
c.sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
} // THIS
break;

                    case 3028:
                            if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)// {
                            return;
                            c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
                            c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
                            c.setAnimation(0x33D);
                           
                            c.sM("You drink some of the recovery special.");
                            c.sM("You have 1 dose of the potion left.");

c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
//}
if (c.specialAmount > 90) {
c.sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
} // THIS
break;

                    case 3030:
                            if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000) //{
                            return;
                            c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
                            c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
                            c.setAnimation(0x33D);
                           
                            c.sM("You drink some of the recovery special.");
                            c.sM("You have finished your potion.");

c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
//}
if (c.specialAmount > 90) {
c.sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
} //THIS
break;

Try this :

if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000) //{

c.addItem(3026, 1);

c.sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
}
break;
case 3026:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000) //{

                    case 3028:

                    case 3030:

item.dc:creator: @Bakpao Bakpao
item.description:
@Bakpao wrote:

Ok, we’re getting closer on this.

I found a mistake that I made, and you forgot to fix it.
along with the following: else if (c.specialAmount > 90); {
Semicollum is not required there. ( that was my big ? ( question )

sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
has to become c.sM

6 errors left, orphaned cases.

CURRENT CODE:

[code] case 3024:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000) //{
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.setAnimation(0x33D);

			c.sM("You drink some of the recovery special.");
			c.sM("You have 3 doses of the potion left.");

c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
//}
if (c.specialAmount > 90) {
c.sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
break;
case 3026:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000) //{
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.setAnimation(0x33D);

			c.sM("You drink some of the recovery special.");
			c.sM("You have 2 doses of the potion left.");

c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
//}
if (c.specialAmount > 90) {
c.sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
break;

                case 3028:
                            if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)// {
                            return;
                            c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
                            c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
                            c.setAnimation(0x33D);
                           
                            c.sM("You drink some of the recovery special.");
                            c.sM("You have 1 dose of the potion left.");

c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
//}
if (c.specialAmount > 90) {
c.sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
break;

		case 3030:
			if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000) //{
			return;
			c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
			c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
			c.setAnimation(0x33D);
			
			c.sM("You drink some of the recovery special.");
			c.sM("You have finished your potion.");

c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
//}
if (c.specialAmount > 90) {
c.sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
break; [/code]

item.title: Tricky to me, simple to some of you. SOLVED
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

ur closing brackets but not opening them i fixed ur whole code, (look below)

This is how a case works:
case ####:
if (BLABLABLA) {
sm(“blablabla”);
}else if(BLABLABLA == 90){
sm(“blablabla is full”);
}
break;

ur big question:
else if (c.specialAmount > 90); {

else if(special bar is full) { start message
send this message
} end of message


FIXED CODE

[code]case 3024:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000){
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.setAnimation(0x33D);
c.sM(“You drink some of the recovery special.”);
c.sM(“You have 3 doses of the potion left.”);
c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
}
else if (c.specialAmount > 90); {
sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
}
break;

case 3026:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000){
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.setAnimation(0x33D);
c.sM(“You drink some of the recovery special.”);
c.sM(“You have 2 doses of the potion left.”);
c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
}
if (c.specialAmount > 90); {
sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
}
break;

case 3028:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000){
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.setAnimation(0x33D);
c.sM(“You drink some of the recovery special.”);
c.sM(“You have 1 dose of the potion left.”);
c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
}
else if (c.specialAmount > 90); {
sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
}
break;

case 3030:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000){
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.setAnimation(0x33D);
c.sM(“You drink some of the recovery special.”);
c.sM(“You have finished your potion.”);
c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
}
else if (c.specialAmount > 90); {
sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
}
break;[/code]

item.title: Tricky to me, simple to some of you. SOLVED
item.dc:creator: @Bakpao Bakpao
item.description:
@Bakpao wrote:

Either I am a big noob, or your codes aren’t right.

[code] case 3024:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.setAnimation(0x33D);

			c.sM("You drink some of the recovery special.");
			c.sM("You have 3 doses of the potion left.");

c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
}
else if (c.specialAmount > 90); {
sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
}
break;
case 3026:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.setAnimation(0x33D);

			c.sM("You drink some of the recovery special.");
			c.sM("You have 2 doses of the potion left.");

c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
}
if (c.specialAmount > 90); {
sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
}
break;

                case 3028:
                            if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)
                            return;
                            c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
                            c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
                            c.setAnimation(0x33D);
                           
                            c.sM("You drink some of the recovery special.");
                            c.sM("You have 1 dose of the potion left.");

c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
}
else if (c.specialAmount > 90); {
sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
}
break;

		case 3030:
			if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)
			return;
			c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
			c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
			c.setAnimation(0x33D);
			
			c.sM("You drink some of the recovery special.");
			c.sM("You have finished your potion.");

c.specialAmount += 10;
c.specAttack();
c.deleteItem(3024, slot, 1);
c.addItem(3026, 1);
}
else if (c.specialAmount > 90); {
sM(“Your special attack is fully recovered already!”);
}
break;

100 errors.[/code]

and THIS: else if (c.specialAmount > 90); { is a big ? to me.
